job_title: Java Full stack Developer with APIs in Rally and Clarity tools Exp
jd: Hello Team,Please share resume for below mentioned job description.Job Title :- Java Full stack Developer with APIs in Rally and Clarity tools Exp.Location :- Hartford, CTDuration- 12+ monthsImplementation- TCS Passport no. is mandatory for roleJob Description :-Essential Skills: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Full Stack Developer with expertise in Rally, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS Lambda, and Chart.js. The ideal candidate should have 5+ years of development experience, with a strong background in creating APIs in Rally and Clarity tools. You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and maintaining a React-based standalone reporting application hosted on AWS. This application will extract and consolidate data from various sources (Rally API, Clarity API, workforce management tools, and Apptio) to provide insightful reporting to agile, business, and financial leaders.Desirable Skills: - 8+ years of development experience in a full-stack role, with a focus on JavaScript, React, Node.js, and AWS.- Strong experience working with Rally API and Clarity API, including creating and managing APIs.- Expertise in React.js for building dynamic user interfaces.- Proficient in Node.js for backend development.- Hands-on experience with AWS Lambda for serverless architecture.- Proficiency in creating data visualizations using Chart.js or similar libraries.- Solid understanding of API integration and handling large data sets.- Familiarity with workforce management tools and Apptio is a plus.- Strong knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.- Experience with agile methodologies and tools.
